Investigator Laki:
I am definitely glad you're here. Here's what we've found out about the 6th seal.
After a fair bit of research, we've located Shilen's 6th seal, the Seal of Punishment. But since it is in a different dimension, it's hard to get close.
While trying to figure out a different avenue of approach, we noticed Tanta Lizardmen doing something suspicious out in the Plains of the Lizardmen.
